alert.note: Alert for Crittenden (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Crittenden, DeSoto, eastern Tunica, western Tate, northeastern Quitman, northwestern Panola and southwestern Shelby Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 859 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pinckney to near Robinsonville to near Crenshaw. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southaven, Olive Branch, West Memphis, Horn Lake, Hernando, Senatobia, T O Fuller State Park, Memphis, Coldwater, Como, Walls, Crenshaw, Sledge, Edmondson, Horseshoe Lake, Anthonyville, Lake Cormorant, Southwest Memphis, Strayhorn and Eudora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
